name: Decryption
description: Decryption. This contract performs encryption and decryption functions. Decrypt is used by SkaleDKG contract to decrypt secret key contribution to validate complaints during the DKG procedure.

functionDecorators.name: decrypt
functionDecorators.description: Returns a secret given an encrypted text and a key.

functionDecorators.name: encrypt
functionDecorators.description: Returns an encrypted text given a secret and a key.
